definition: Huanglong county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
lit. to directly attack Huanglong/fig. to directly combat the root of a problem
Huanglong county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
huanglongbing, citrus greening disease

sentences.english: This pond looks much smaller than the Yellow Dragon Pond.
sentences.chinese: 這個潭好像比黃龍潭小了不少啊。

sentences.english: Bemo-roof system is used as roof boarding of Huanglong Gymnasium in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省黃龍體育館的屋面板採用貝姆屋面系統。

sentences.english: Burning fire dragon in Huanglongxi dated back to the Southern Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 黃龍溪燒火龍起源於南宋時期。

sentences.english: Why I feel the climb up at Huanglong this time a lot easier than last?
sentences.chinese: 我怎麼覺得這次爬黃龍比上次輕鬆多了？

sentences.english: To protect Huanglong is to save our mankind.
sentences.chinese: 保護黃龍就是保護我們人類。

sentences.english: Daniel, coming to Huanglong again, why are you so excited?
sentences.chinese: 大牛，再次來到黃龍，你怎麼這麼興奮？

sentences.english: Thus three ponds of different sizes appeared as the home of the Yellow Dragon's family.
sentences.chinese: 剷出了三個大小不等的潭作爲黃龍一家的棲息地。

sentences.english: Huanglong Mountain Reclamation was given during the war established under the social background.
sentences.chinese: 陝西黃龍山墾區是在戰時特定的社會背景下形成的。

sentences.english: Huanglong is one of the State-Level AAAA Tourist Attractions.
sentences.chinese: 黃龍是國家AAAA級風景名勝區。

sentences.english: Letting roads give way to trees is an innovation in environmental protection at Huanglong.
sentences.chinese: 路讓樹這是黃龍環保工作的一項創舉。

sentences.english: Viewer friends, now is the most beautiful season at Huanglong.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆朋友們，現在是黃龍最美麗的季節。

sentences.english: Tour in Huanglong is also a spiritual tour to experience the Tibetan and Qiang culture.
sentences.chinese: 黃龍之旅也是體驗藏羌文化的精神之旅。

sentences.english: The county government has yet to release the body, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 縣政府還沒有交出他兒子的遺體，吳黃龍說。

sentences.english: By early afternoon the river has opened up and finally we see it - ancient Huanglonxi.
sentences.chinese: 午後不久，眼前終於出現了黃龍溪的身影。

sentences.english: Huanglong is one of the best sight-seeing spots in the world.
sentences.chinese: 黃龍是世界上最佳觀光地之一。

sentences.english: Huanglong is developing Eco-tourism in a sustainable way.
sentences.chinese: 黃龍正在走一條可持續發展的戰略生態旅遊之路。

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
